item.title: ACSS Surveillance Processor TCAS II Functionality (STC ST02053LA) – Resolution Advisory (RA) Display System(s) (VSI/RA) – Both Inoperative (EFB Installed)

numlitem.para: Traffic Alert (TA) visual display and audio functions are operative,
TA only mode is selected by crew, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.

placard.para: Placard both IVSI's "RA INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
